title: WTB Polar Bear Low Grade Commons
author: thomasnace

posts.post_title: WTB Polar Bear Low Grade Commons
posts.post_content:
Looking to spend some fantasy baseball winnings to expand my small collection. I collect PSA 1-4 Polar Bears. Let me know if you have anything to help me out! 

Also, anyone know of any card shows in the Philadelphia area this Spring?
Valley Forge at the casino March 6, 7 and 8th.

Awesome, that's less than a month away! Thanks.

To clarify, I don't collect only PSA 1-4, but I display my PSA Polar Bears in my house (something about uniformity). Raw and SGC are fine, so let me know what steals you have for me!
